project1Description: This game was developed as part of a group project at Saxion University of Applied Sciences, in the Netherlands.
I worked alongside game designers and 2D/3D artists to create a game for a younger audience, based on monsters imagined by children from a partner school.
The goal was to design a fun and accessible game, faithful to the universe created by the children, while providing a coherent gameplay experience.
As a Unity developer, I was responsible for gameplay programming, 3D monster animation integration, and world interaction systems.
This project helped me improve my interdisciplinary teamwork skills and my ability to adapt to a specific target audience.
